duties_responsibilities.duty: Supporting the Store Manager and Assistant Store Manager in achieving retail store targets by driving sales.
Opening and closing the store in the absence of other management to ensure safe and legal trading.
Delivering sales through friendly and efficient customer service.
Assisting customers with their queries using product knowledge.
Assisting with processing store deliveries, visual merchandising, stock takes, markdowns, and promotions.
Ensuring the store looks presentable and inviting to customers.

education_certification.credential: Some high school required, and basic computer skills.
